title: ClusterInfo contains information about the cluster

apiVersions.title: APIVersions contains list of API versions supported by the cluster

applicationsCount.title: ApplicationsCount is the number of applications managed by Argo CD on the cluster

cacheInfo.title: ClusterCacheInfo contains information about the cluster cache

apisCount.title: APIsCount holds number of observed Kubernetes API count

lastCacheSyncTime.description:
Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct
marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many
of the factory methods that the time package offers.

+protobuf.options.marshal=false
+protobuf.as=Timestamp
+protobuf.options.(gogoproto.goproto_stringer)=false

resourcesCount.title: ResourcesCount holds number of observed Kubernetes resources

connectionState.title: ConnectionState contains information about remote resource connection state, currently used for clusters and repositories

attemptedAt.description:
Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct
marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many
of the factory methods that the time package offers.

+protobuf.options.marshal=false
+protobuf.as=Timestamp
+protobuf.options.(gogoproto.goproto_stringer)=false

message.title: Message contains human readable information about the connection status

status.title: Status contains the current status indicator for the connection

serverVersion.title: ServerVersion contains information about the Kubernetes version of the cluster
